title: doc: impossible to figure out how to checkout sources
body:
http://golang.org/project page has "Check out the Go source code" link which leads to incomprehensible page  with no obvious way to checkout code (I still did not found it there).

http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html assumes that you already has code and starts with discussing testing.

"Check out the Go source code" must contain instructions on how to actually checkout code.

"Contribution Guidelines" needs to include commands to checkout code as well.

@adg
